code: export function check(){var checkB=document.querySelector('.BtnF');var checkBut=document.querySelector('.InputCheck');if(checkBut.checked){checkB.type='submit';checkB.classList.add('checked');}else{checkB.type='button';checkB.classList.remove('checked');}}export function checkBtn(){var checkB=document.querySelector('.BtnF');if(checkB.type=='button'){alert('Ознакомтесь с нашими правилами!');}}
